question: Who am i ?
reponse:
im Driss HAMRA ! 24yo, i live in casablanca. 
 i got my baccalaureate in 2013, then i joined the university of Economy and Management and got my university degree. But it wasn't really what i want to do. being a banker or an accountant. it's not really my thing. So i started learning programming language. and joind an Institut of computer science (ISGI Casablanca).

question: What about your professional experience ?
reponse: my first professionel experience is a traineeship at Oumdin Technology. where i worked on an interesting project. using recent technology as .NET Core web API, Angular 7 and Xamarin. and im currently a .NET Developer at Accenture Technology since june 2019.

question: what do you do at Accenture ?
reponse: im working on an insurance project as a .NET Developer. it's a big project with a big team we're nearly 40 person, i learned a lot of things as using TFS, PL/SQL and more... the project contains lot of application as ASP.NET Web forms application, web services, desktop applications and lot lot lot of scripts (ORACLE)

question: Why do you want to leave Accenture ?
reponse: i've been at Accenture since june 2019, and i think it's time to take a new adventure. learn another things and meet new poeple !

question: What is the technologies that you use ?
reponse: i can say that im a Microsoft FAN ! ^^, i worked with all platforms. Desktop (Windows forms, UWP), Web (ASP.NET Web forms & MVC), Mobile with Xamarin, also worked with .NET CORE and web services (Rest/soap), i use Angular as well since it version 7. but i believe that it doesn't matter what technology you use, since you know the concept it's OK ! so i'm open to learn other technologies !
